abstract: Undercover New York City police officer who seen drawing his weapon on bystanders during arrest in Harlem, and then punching person videotaping episode on cellphone, is placed on modified duty until Internal Affairs investigation is completed; officer's identity is not released.
lead_paragraph: Cellphone footage shows the officer, who was in plain clothes, attacking a bystander who was videotaping an arrest and wrestling him to the ground.

headline.main: Officer Stripped of Gun and Badge After Punching Man in Harlem
headline.print_headline: Officer Who Punched Man Is Reassigned

snippet: Cellphone footage shows the officer, who was in plain clothes, attacking a bystander who was videotaping an arrest and wrestling him to the ground.
